item.title: From Messy to Tidy: Identify and Split Based on Geographic Scope
item.description: 1 Partially Tidy Data Sets 2 Philippine Geography Crash Course 3 Geography Challenge 3.1 Location Level 3.2 Region Tags 3.3 Split and Save 4 Up Next 5 Code 6 References 1 Partially Tidy Data Sets So far, we have converted the messy Philippine Consumer Price Index data to a partially tidy data. We did this by collecting the date columns into one column, adapting the dates into ISO 8601 format, interpreting the code column into more meaningful item descriptions, and separating the data by item level.
